import React from 'react'; import './search-bar.css' import { Alert, Col, Form, FormGroup } from 'reactstrap'; import { useRef } from 'react'; const Searchbar = () => { const locationRef=useRef('') const distanceRef=useRef(0) const maxGroupRef=useRef(0) const searchhandler =()=>{ const locationRef=locationRef.current.value const distanceRef=distanceRef.current.value const maxGroupRef=maxGroupRef.current.value if(locationRef=== '' || distanceRef=== '' || maxGroupRef === ''){ return alert("All field are required!") } } return
Location
Distance
Max
} export default Searchbar;
